name: Baldi's Basics Remastered Edition
description:
Baldi's Basics Classic is getting a remaster! To celebrate Baldi's Late 2 Years Anniversary, I decided to use a decompile to remaster Baldi's Basics Classic Such as:

New Item: Low Charged Battery, Radio will be found in the Geography Room!

1.4.3 Lighting!

New Outside!

and Revamped Stamina!
